sentences.sContent: Attach a recent photograph to your application form.
When approving a merger, the commission can attach conditions.
sentences.sCn: 委员会在批准公司合并时可能附加条件。

sentences.sContent: ...as of yet it is impossible to attach them all in a new person...

synos.tran: 使依附；贴上；系上；使依恋

remMethod.val: at(表加强) ＋ tach(接触) → 系， 贴

words.tran: 附加的；依恋的，充满爱心的
可附上的；可连接的；可逮捕的；可没收的
附件；依恋；连接物；扣押财产

trans.tranOther: to fasten or connect one object to another
